body.section: The role of the validator is to analyse the potential updates and changes devised by the terminology modeller(s) and resolve any conflicts that have arisen as part of the Quality Assurance framework. terminology development is undertaken using a dual independent modelling approach, whereby each target concept is modelled in SNOMED by two modellers working independently. The change sets produced by the two modellers are then compared and presented to the validator role. At the time of writing, tool support for this process is still being developed.
